verses.verse: וְשָׂרַי֙ <WH8297> Now Sarai אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> Abram's לֹ֥א <WH3808> him no יָלְדָ֖ה <WH3205> children ל֑וֹ וְלָ֛הּ שִׁפְחָ֥ה <WH8198> and she had an handmaid מִצְרִ֖ית <WH4713> an Egyptian וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <WH8034> whose name הָגָֽר׃ <WH1904> [was] Hagar

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׂרַ֜י <WH8297> And Sarai אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> unto Abram הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold נָ֞א <WH4994> Now עֲצָרַ֤נִי <WH6113> hath restrained me יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Behold now the LORD מִלֶּ֔דֶת <WH3205> from bearing בֹּא־ <WH935> I pray thee go in נָא֙ <WH4994> Please אֶל־ <WH413> to שִׁפְחָתִ֔י <WH8198> unto my maid אוּלַ֥י <WH194> it may אִבָּנֶ֖ה <WH1129> be that I may obtain children מִמֶּ֑נָּה <WH4480> through וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hearkened אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> by her And Abram לְק֥וֹל <WH6963> to the voice שָׂרָֽי׃ <WH8297> of Sarai

וַתִּקַּ֞ח <WH3947> took שָׂרַ֣י <WH8297> And Sarai אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife אַבְרָ֗ם <WH87> Abram's אֶת־ <WH853> הָגָ֤ר <WH1904> Hagar הַמִּצְרִית֙ <WH4713> the Egyptian שִׁפְחָתָ֔הּ <WH8198> her maid מִקֵּץ֙ <WH7093> after עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> ten שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years לְשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> had dwelt אַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> Abram בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and gave אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> לְאַבְרָ֥ם <WH87> Abram אִישָׁ֖הּ <WH582> another ל֥וֹ לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to be his wife

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> And he went in אֶל־ <WH413> to הָגָ֖ר <WH1904> unto Hagar וַתַּ֑הַר <WH2029> and she conceived וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> and when she saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הָרָ֔תָה <WH2029> that she had conceived וַתֵּקַ֥ל <WH7043> was despised גְּבִרְתָּ֖הּ <WH1404> her mistress בְּעֵינֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5869> in her eyes

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said שָׂרַ֣י <WH8297> And Sarai אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָם֮ <WH87> unto Abram חֲמָסִ֣י <WH2555> My wrong עָלֶיךָ֒ <WH5921> and אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I נָתַ֤תִּי <WH5414> [be] upon thee I have given שִׁפְחָתִי֙ <WH8198> my maid בְּחֵיקֶ֔ךָ <WH2436> into thy bosom וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <WH7200> and when she saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הָרָ֔תָה <WH2029> that she had conceived וָאֵקַ֖ל <WH7043> I was despised בְּעֵינֶ֑יהָ <WH5869> in her eyes יִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> judge יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בֵּינִ֥י <WH996> between וּבֵינֶֽיׅךָ׃ <WH996> between

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָ֜ם <WH87> But Abram אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׂרַ֗י <WH8297> unto Sarai הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold שִׁפְחָתֵךְ֙ <WH8198> Behold thy maid בְּיָדֵ֔ךְ <WH3027> [is] in thy hand עֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> do לָ֖הּ הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> to her what בְּעֵינָ֑יִךְ <WH5869> your sight וַתְּעַנֶּ֣הָ <WH6031> dealt hardly with שָׂרַ֔י <WH8297> And when Sarai וַתִּבְרַ֖ח <WH1272> her she fled מִפָּנֶֽיהָ׃ <WH6440> from her face

וַֽיִּמְצָאָ֞הּ <WH4672> found her מַלְאַ֧ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> by עֵ֥ין <WH5869> by a fountain הַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> of water בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> in the wilderness עַל־ <WH5921> by הָעַ֖יִן <WH5869> by the fountain בְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way שֽׁוּר׃ <WH7793> to Shur

וַיֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> And he said הָגָ֞ר <WH1904> Hagar שִׁפְחַ֥ת <WH8198> maid שָׂרַ֛י <WH8297> Sarai's אֵֽי־ <WH335> whence מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> have you בָ֖את <WH935> camest thou וְאָ֣נָה <WH575> and where תֵלֵ֑כִי <WH1980> He וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> ? And she said מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> from the face שָׂרַ֣י <WH8297> Sarai גְּבִרְתִּ֔י <WH1404> of my mistress אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I בֹּרַֽחַת׃ <WH1272> I flee

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהּ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD שׁ֖וּבִי <WH7725> unto her Return אֶל־ <WH413> to גְּבִרְתֵּ֑ךְ <WH1404> to thy mistress וְהִתְעַנִּ֖י <WH6031> and submit תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> Thahash יָדֶֽיהָ׃ <WH3027> thyself under her hands

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהּ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הַרְבָּ֥ה <WH7235> unto her I will multiply אַרְבֶּ֖ה <WH7235> exceedingly אֶת־ <WH853> זַרְעֵ֑ךְ <WH2233> thy seed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will be too יִסָּפֵ֖ר <WH5608> that it shall not be numbered מֵרֹֽב׃ <WH7230> for multitude

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לָהּ֙ מַלְאַ֣ךְ <WH4397> And the angel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD הִנָּ֥ךְ <WH2009> unto her Behold הָרָ֖ה <WH2030> thou [art] with child וְיֹלַ֣דְתְּ <WH3205> and shalt bear בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וְקָרָ֤את <WH7121> and shalt call שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> his name יִשְׁמָעֵ֔אל <WH3458> Ishmael כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> hath heard יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to עָנְיֵֽךְ׃ <WH6040> thy affliction

וְה֤וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶה֙ <WH1961> will be a פֶּ֣רֶא <WH6501> And he will be a wild אָדָ֔ם <WH120> man יָד֣וֹ <WH3027> his hand בַכֹּ֔ל <WH3605> everyone וְיַ֥ד <WH3027> [will be] against every man and every man's hand כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> and everyone's בּ֑וֹ וְעַל־ <WH5921> unto פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> in the presence כָל־ <WH3605> of all אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> of all his brethren יִשְׁכֹּֽן׃ <WH7931> against him and he shall dwell

וַתִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> And she called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> the name יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הַדֹּבֵ֣ר <WH1696> that spake אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> about אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אֵ֣ל <WH410> unto her Thou God רֳאִ֑י <WH7210> seest me כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָֽמְרָ֗ה <WH559> for she said הֲגַ֥ם <WH1571> even הֲלֹ֛ם <WH1988> Have I also here רָאִ֖יתִי <WH7200> looked אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after him רֹאִֽי׃ <WH7200> remained

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that קָרָ֣א <WH7121> was called לַבְּאֵ֔ר <WH875> Wherefore the well בְּאֵ֥ר לַחַ֖י רֹאִ֑י <WH883> Beer-lahai-roi הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> behold בֵין־ <WH996> is between קָדֵ֖שׁ <WH6946> behold [it is] between Kadesh וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> is between בָּֽרֶד׃ <WH1260> and Bered

וַתֵּ֧לֶד <WH3205> bare הָגָ֛ר <WH1904> And Hagar לְאַבְרָ֖ם <WH87> Abram בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אַבְרָ֧ם <WH87> and Abram שֶׁם־ <WH8034> name בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> his son's אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom יָלְדָ֥ה <WH3205> bare הָגָ֖ר <WH1904> which Hagar יִשְׁמָעֵֽאל׃ <WH3458> Ishmael

וְאַבְרָ֕ם <WH87> And Abram בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמֹנִ֥ים <WH8084> was eighty-six שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וְשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> and six שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years בְּלֶֽדֶת־ <WH3205> bare הָגָ֥ר <WH1904> when Hagar אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׁמָעֵ֖אל <WH3458> Ishmael לְאַבְרָֽם׃ <WH87> to Abram ס
